regen.absent_element: specification for handling situations when the system is unable to repair computation errors
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert operators and log events when it encounters computation errors that cannot be repaired.

regen.absent_element: notification mechanism for out of tolerance conditions
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the operator when an out of tolerance condition is detected in I/O Performance or Compute Performance
The system shall notify operators when computation error statistics exceed tolerances.

label: Report all out of tolerance conditions when monitoring Compute Errors.
absence: action of reporting when monitoring Compute Errors
